Description:
Model
Brand: Noctua
Series: NH-U12S redux
Model: NF-P12 redux-1700 PWM


Details
Type: Fan & Heatsinks
Fan Size: 120mm
CPU Socket Compatibility: Intel LGA1700, LGA1200, LGA1150, LGA1151, LGA1155, LGA1156, LGA2011, LGA2066 and AMD AM4 & AM5
Bearing Type: SSO2
RPM: 450-1700RPM
Air Flow: 120,2 m³/h
Noise Level: 25,1 dB(A)
Power Connector: 4 Pin
Heatsink Material: Nickel plated Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins)
Fan Mounting Types to Heatsink: Vertical


Dimensions & Weight
Max CPU Cooler Height: 158 mm
Fan Dimensions: 120x120x25mm
Heatsink Dimensions: Height (without fan) 158 mm
Width (without fan) 125 mm
Depth (without fan) 45 mm
Height (with fan) 158 mm
Width (with fan) 125 mm
Depth (with fan) 71 mm
Weight: 755g


Package Contents
Package Contents: NH-U12S redux heatsink
NF-P12 redux-1700 PWM fan
4x NA-AVP1 chromax.grey anti-vibration pads
Fan mounting clips (one pair)
NT-H1 high-grade thermal compound (pre-applied)
SecuFirm2™ mounting kit
Label: Disipador Noctua NH-U12S Redux Grey
